options.content: This dashboard requires ONTAP 9.6+ and REST private CLI. See power algorithm for more details. Power and temperature metrics may not be visible for clusters with **embedded** disk shelves. Those metrics are computed at the cluster level, not at the level of individual shelves. Embedded shelf power is shared among the common nodes.

panels.description: This panel displays total power of nodes and shelves.
panels.title: Total Power

panels.description: Average Power per used TB.
panels.title: Average Power/Used_TB

panels.description: Maximum temperature of all non-ambient sensors for node in Celsius.
panels.title: Max Node Temp

panels.description: Maximum fan speed for shelf in rpm.
panels.title: Max Shelf Fan Speed

panels.description: Average IOPs per Watt.
panels.title: Average IOPs/Watt

panels.description: Maximum temperature of all non-ambient sensors for shelf in Celsius.
panels.title: Max Shelf Temp

panels.description: Maximum fan speed for node in rpm.
panels.title: Max Node Fan Speed

panels.description: This panel displays total power consumed by Node, Shelf and both.
panels.title: Total Power Consumed

panels.description: This panel displays the average power consumption in kilowatt-hours (kWh) over the last hour for Nodes, Shelves, and the total combined.
panels.title: Average Power Consumption (kWh) Over Last Hour

panels.description: Power consumed by a node in Watts.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Nodes by Power Consumed

panels.description: Average temperature of all non-ambient sensors for node in Celsius.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Nodes by Average Temperature

panels.description: Power consumed by shelf in Watts.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Shelves by Power Consumed

panels.description: Average temperature of all non-ambient sensors for shelf in Celsius.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Shelves by Average Temperature

panels.description:
View the power usage at the aggregate level, track down any "hot" aggregates and their corresponding workloads.

The line chart provides the ability to see how read/write IOs directly affect the power usage of the system. .
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by Power Consumed

panels.description: Power used across your Aggregate disk types.
panels.title: Aggregates Power by Disk Type

panels.description: Provides the ability to see how read/write IOs directly affect the power usage of the system.
panels.title: Top $TopResources Aggregates by IOPS per Power Consumed

panels.description: Aggregate details.
panels.title: Aggregates

panels.description: Displays sensors with failed state.
panels.title: Sensor Problems

options.content: This panel requires a cluster with ONTAP 9.6+ and the Harvest REST collector.

panels.description: Displays information about the status of Field Replaceable Units (FRUs).
panels.title: Field Replaceable Unit (FRU)

panels.description: Storage node details.
panels.title: Storage Nodes

panels.description: Storage shelf details.
panels.title: Storage Shelves
